content:
abrown opened PR #5739 from update-threads-support to main:

As requested here, this updates the documentation to indicate that the WebAssembly threads proposal is now supported. It looks like the spec tests are already running in build.rs but if there is any issue with that it can be resolved separately; this change simply documents the current level support.

abrown edited PR #5739 from update-threads-support to main:

As requested [here], this updates the documentation to indicate that the WebAssembly threads proposal is now supported. It looks like the spec tests are already running in build.rs but if there is any issue with that it can be resolved separately; this change simply documents the current level support on this [page].

[here]: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/5484#pullrequestreview-1287807514
[page]: https://docs.wasmtime.dev/stability-wasm-proposals-support.html
